About

I’m a University of Iowa Computer Science graduate who thrives on pairing clean architecture with thoughtful UX. I’ve delivered full-stack web apps for product discovery, real-time inventory, and internal ticketing—always anchoring decisions in measurable outcomes.

  • Product-minded: Collaborate with designers and stakeholders to prioritize features that move metrics.
  • Full-stack: Build responsive front-ends with React, Vue, and Angular backed by .NET and PostgreSQL services.
  • Continuous learning: Experiment with modern tooling (Vercel, Supabase, Prisma) to improve delivery speed and reliability.

Project Description
